reviewText: Chop sucky thought it would be gem because it was starring S.B.  Kara Hui &the famous Chin siu Ho  Known from venoms and jet li movies but they only show off their skills once &there was a gun fight in the beginning that was so bad that it was funny.so the first 20 min. make u think about to see a good hk movie but the story gets so boring and convoluted with to many characters that it seemed they forgot about the fact that they have two of the best hk fighters of all time on the payroll.
